text: Huge selection on the menu. Friendly bi-lingual service. The fresh cheese curds on the pouting are out if this world. You must come on a Friday to try.

Terrible food. The pizza had no sauce, the fries looked like they where re heated in a microwave and the club sandwich bread was half wet and half hard. Owner hung up on us after we complaint about the poor quality of the food.

This is not a place to enjoy a dining experience, this is more the place that one should avoid.
Petit restaurant de village ou il est possible de commander une bonne pizza, sous marin,poisson a tr√®s bon prix. Il y a aussi une belle terrasse. Livraison rapide.
